amendment.description: To restore $100 million to the Land and Water Conservation Fund Stateside Grant Program by closing corporate tax loopholes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3089 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3089 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S2269-2271; text: CR S2270) To restore $100 million to the Land and Water Conservation Fund Stateside Grant Program by closing corporate tax loopholes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3089 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3089 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Salazar.
